item.title: A Visit to the University of Texas’s Art Museum in Austin
item.description: A nice place, but someone should explain what ‘extraction’ means to the wealth of the nation and people’s paychecks.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s Horrific Murder Is a Tragedy — and a Warning
item.description: If we are to remain the place the Founders hoped we would be, then we cannot ever treat such events as acceptable or deserved.

item.title: The Tragedy of Lifespans in Politics
item.description: Charlie Kirk was denied the chance to grow and mature in political commentary.

item.title: The Atlantic’s Originalist Sin
item.description: A historian misrepresents conservative jurisprudence and misunderstands the greatness of our founding document.

item.title: Any TikTok Deal Must Separate It from China
item.description: The administration, having long flouted the law, now appears poised to evade it permanently.
